# NIAlgorithmConvergenceStatusConverged

**Enumeration Case**

A status that indicates the framework’s Camera Assistance feature is operational.

## Declaration

```swift
NIAlgorithmConvergenceStatusConverged
```

## Discussion

In this state, the app doesn’t need to coach the user and receives all the benefits of Camera Assistance as described in [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyPeerConfiguration/isCameraAssistanceEnabled].

## Inspecting the convergence state reason

- **NIAlgorithmConvergenceStatusNotConverged**: A status that indicates the framework’s Camera Assistance feature requires action from the user.
- **NIAlgorithmConvergenceStatusUnknown**: An indication that the framework is unsure of the Camera Assistance status.
